mapper.insert: INSERT INTO computer_tb VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(com_no)+1,1) FROM Computer_TB), #{cate_no}, #{product}, #{spec}, #{image}, #{quantity}, #{cost}, #{gift}, #{sell_cnt}, #{stock_cnt}, #{hit} )
mapper.select: SELECT com_no,cate_no,product,image,cost,num FROM (SELECT com_no,cate_no,product,image,cost,rownum as num FROM (SELECT com_no,cate_no,product,image,cost FROM computer_tb WHERE cate_no=#{cate_no} ORDER BY com_no DESC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM computer_tb WHERE ROWID IN(SELECT MAX(ROWID) FROM computer_tb WHERE cate_no=#{cate_no} GROUP BY product)
SELECT com_no,product,spec,image,cost,gift FROM computer_tb where com_no=#{com_no}
